20110112150414.000|20110112150415.000|CC1|PHILADELPHIA, BUT IT STRETCHES

20110112150628.000|20110112150629.000|CC1|HARD AS WELL.                   
20110112150629.000|20110112150630.000|CC1|NBC'S JEFF ROSSEN IS IN         
20110112150630.000|20110112150630.000|CC1|HARTFORD.                       
20110112150630.000|20110112150632.000|CC1|JEFF, GOOD MORNING TO YOU.      
20110112150632.000|20110112150633.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HI, MEREDITH.      
20110112150633.000|20110112150634.000|CC1|GOOD MORNING TO YOU.            
20110112150634.000|20110112150641.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN SNOWING HERE FOR TEN  
20110112150641.000|20110112150641.000|CC1|HOURS.                          
20110112150641.000|20110112150642.000|CC1|NO SCIENCE OF IT LETTING UP.    
20110112150642.000|20110112150642.000|CC1|IN FACT, IT'S STILL COMING      
20110112150642.000|20110112150643.000|CC1|SIDEWAYS A LITTLE BIT.          
20110112150643.000|20110112150645.000|CC1|IT'S THE WIND THAT REALLY HITS  
20110112150645.000|20110112150646.000|CC1|YOUR FACE, THAT'S THE PROBLEM.  
20110112150646.000|20110112150648.000|CC1|ALREADY HERE IN HARTFORD ALONE, 
20110112150648.000|20110112150649.000|CC1|15 INCHES ON THE GROUND.        
20110112150649.000|20110112150650.000|CC1|MORE THAN A FOOT.               
20110112150650.000|20110112150652.000|CC1|AND IN SOME AREAS OF THE STATE, 
20110112150652.000|20110112150654.000|CC1|AS AL MENTIONED, CLOSE TO 2 FEET
20110112150654.000|20110112150654.000|CC1|ALREADY.                        
20110112150654.000|20110112150655.000|CC1|AND THEY'RE GOING TO GO OVER    
20110112150655.000|20110112150656.000|CC1|THAT AS THE SNOW CONTINUES TO   
20110112150656.000|20110112150656.000|CC1|GO.                             
20110112150656.000|20110112150659.000|CC1|YOU CAN SEE, THIS IS NOT EVEN A 
20110112150659.000|20110112150701.000|CC1|SNOWDRIFT I'M STANDING IN HERE, 
20110112150701.000|20110112150702.000|CC1|THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT HAS FALLEN 
20110112150702.000|20110112150702.000|CC1|SO FAR.                         
20110112150702.000|20110112150704.000|CC1|WE'RE STANDING RIGHT IN THE AREA
20110112150704.000|20110112150706.000|CC1|OF SOME BIG INTERSECTIONS.      
20110112150706.000|20110112150707.000|CC1|THIS IS THE STATE CAPITOL HERE  
20110112150707.000|20110112150708.000|CC1|IN CONNECTICUT.                 
20110112150708.000|20110112150709.000|CC1|AND YOU CAN SEE AS A POLICE     
20110112150709.000|20110112150710.000|CC1|OFFICER GOES BY, PEOPLE KEEP    
20110112150710.000|20110112150711.000|CC1|GETTING STUCK.                  
20110112150711.000|20110112150713.000|CC1|THE ROADS, EVEN THE MAIN ROADS, 
20110112150713.000|20110112150715.000|CC1|AREN'T PLOWED YET, AND THE PLOWS
20110112150715.000|20110112150716.000|CC1|KEEP COMING BY.                 
20110112150716.000|20110112150718.000|CC1|THE PROBLEM IS, THE SNOW IS     
20110112150718.000|20110112150720.000|CC1|COMING DOWN AT A RATE SO FAST, 2
20110112150720.000|20110112150722.000|CC1|TO 4 INCHES AN HOUR, THEY JUST

20110112150725.000|20110112150727.000|CC1|HERE JUST A COUPLE OF HOURS AGO,

20110112153706.000|20110112153708.000|CC1|MARIJUANA AND SALVIA.           
20110112153708.000|20110112153710.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND THEN THERE WERE
20110112153710.000|20110112153712.000|CC1|LOUGHNER'S CHOSEN CULTURAL      
20110112153712.000|20110112153713.000|CC1|INFLUENCES, REALITY BENDING     
20110112153713.000|20110112153718.000|CC1|FILMS LIKE DONNIE DARKO.        
20110112153718.000|20110112153726.000|CC1|AND GOVERNMENT CONSPIRACY THEMED
20110112153726.000|20110112153728.000|CC1|DOCUMENTARIES LIKE "LOOSE
